entries.name: name
entries.desc: The name of the locale. It uses IETF language tag format +[language[.codeset]]+. See also BCP 47 - Tags for Identifying Languages.

entries.name: [](locale_name)
entries.desc: Returns the locale object for locale_name.

entries.name: []=(locale_name, locale)
entries.desc: Sets the locale object for locale_name.

entries.name: new(name)
entries.desc: Creates a new locale object for name locale. name must follow IETF language tag format.

entries.name: load(locale_directory)
entries.desc: Loads translation messages from locale_directory/+@name+/rdoc.po or locale_directory/+@name+.po. The former has high priority.

entries.name: translate(message)
entries.desc: Translates the message into locale. If there is no translation messages for message in locale, message itself is returned.
